title: Viktor Statue
body:
So I was looking at the LOL Merch beta website today, and came across those cute little overpriced statue things! I want one really badly, but the champs I like from the list don't look as good/detailed as others. So please listen to my suggestion of making a viktor one riot :D I know, viktor is underplayed and not much people would buy him, but he is a champion I like and would think it would look so badass! 

Thanks

Feel free to comment and make suggestions of other champs you want to buy as a statue!

replies.body: Join the glorious evolution! That being said, Creator Viktor would look beautiful if he was in mid combat. RIP Dosh.
